constantValues: Vehicle or device that is the subject of a lead, which may involve one or more vehicles or devices.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: comments

constantValues: Notes/remarks regarding this vehicle or device.

members.description: Notes/remarks regarding this vehicle or device.

members.name: deviceYear

constantValues: The year of manufacture of the vehicle or device.

members.description: The year of manufacture of the vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: leadId

constantValues: The parent lead that this vehicle or device is associated with.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The parent lead that this vehicle or device is associated with.

members.name: name

constantValues: Name of the vehicle or device in this lead.

members.description: Name of the vehicle or device in this lead.

members.name: price

constantValues: The sales price attributed to this vehicle or device.

members.description: The sales price attributed to this vehicle or device.

members.name: priceBase

constantValues: Value of the price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the price in base currency.

members.name: priceComments

constantValues: Notes/remarks regarding the sales price for this vehicle or device.

members.description: Notes/remarks regarding the sales price for this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: priceTypeId

constantValues: The type of pricing associated with the sales price of this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The type of pricing associated with the sales price of this vehicle or device.

members.name: state

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Type of the device in this vehicle or device (new or used).

members.description: Type of the device in this vehicle or device (new or used).

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'state_display' is added to the 'LeadDevice' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'state'
addSupportingAttribute.name: state_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'LeadDevice' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Lead Device

members.description: Reason for the status of the Lead Device

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'LeadDevice' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
